ja487:5.2: mantaṃ jappanti → yeme japanti (bj, pts1) | ye mantaṃ japanti (s2, s3) | ye'me jappanti mante (^ja377#3 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:6.1: karetha → karotha (bj, pts1) | kareyya (s2, s3) | katvāna (^ja377#4 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:20.3: sajātiṃ pamuñcanti → na tesaṃ jātiṃ pucchanti (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | na tesaṃ jāti sujjhati (mr)
